tossup_question: 35) BIOLOGY  Phloem sap is moved by
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Cytoplasmic Streaming
X) Transpirational Pull
Y) Diffusion
Z) Pressure flow
bonus_question: 35) BIOLOGY  Which of the following statements is false?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Procentriole formation is initiated by phosphorylation of nucleophosmin
X) Centrioles are required for the progression of mitosis in vertebrates
Y) The replication of centrosomes is synchronized with the cell cycle
Z) The centrioles in the centrosome are orthogonally arranged
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) Centrioles are required for the progression of mitosis in vertebrates
